text: Futhi bonke bayovela kuMvelinqangi labo ababuthakathaka bayothi kulabo ababeqhosha “ngempela thina sasingabalandeli benu, ngakubeni nina ningasisiza ngokuthize esijezisweni sikaMvelinqangi na? Bayothi, “ukube uMvelinqangi wayesiholile sasizonihola, kuyefana kuthina noma ngabe asibekezeli noma siyabekezela angeke sikwazi ukuphunyuka”
